sentences.en: a cash infusion into the business
A kind of infusion pump controlled by 89 C 52 single - chip microcomputer is introduced.
sentences.cn: 以89C52单片机为控制核心,用步进电机带动微小流量泵,研制了一种智能化高性能的输液装置.

sentences.en: An infusion of vegetable matter, as from oak bark , tanning.
sentences.cn: 一种用于制革的植物搀和剂, 如从橡树中抽出的物质一样.

sentences.en: Careful observation of the infusion site is necessary.
sentences.cn: 必须仔细观察输液部位.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Rational use of Medicine infusion can reduce ADRS.
sentences.cn: 结论: 合理应用能够减少其不良反应的发生.

sentences.en: He brought a tremendous infusion of hope to the people.
sentences.cn: 他给人们带来极大的希望。

sentences.en: He said Cong Yi is to make arts infusion into ordinary life.
sentences.cn: 他说,从艺就是让艺术灌注到平凡的生活中.

sentences.en: Make an infusion by boiling and simmering the rhubarb and camomile together.
sentences.cn: 将大黄和甘菊一起煮沸再用文火炖，熬成汤药。

sentences.en: OBJECTIVETo evaluate the safety and effectiveness of the airtight infusion method.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨全密闭式输液方式的安全性、有效性.

sentences.en: Old families need an infusion of new blood from time to time.
sentences.cn: 古老的家族需要不时地注入新鲜血液.

sentences.en: Superficial thrombophlebitis remains a common complication of continuous intravenous infusion.
sentences.cn: 浅表血栓性静脉炎是持续静脉注射的常见并发症.

sentences.en: The company is in desperate need of an infusion of capital.
sentences.cn: 在生活穷困中公司极度渴望的注入这首都.

sentences.en: They not only get infusion of skill and capital directly.
sentences.cn: 他们不仅同时获得了技术和资金.

sentences.en: This company needs an infusion of new blood, ie needs new employees to give it vigour.
sentences.cn: 这家公司需要注进新的血液(需要新雇员给公司以活力).

sentences.en: This pump is suitable for small flow, high pressure infusion system.
sentences.cn: 此泵适用于小流量 、 高压力的输液系统.

sentences.en: To render an infusion permanently barren, it must be sealed hermetically and boiled.
sentences.cn: 要长久保持浸液的无生命状态, 必须密封和煮沸.

trans.tran_cn: 注入，灌输，泡制，浸渍，注入物
trans.tran_en: the act of putting a new feeling or quality into something
